Definition at line 20 of file CTracerDriverBase.h.

enum ilolv::CTracerDriverBase::InspectionState [protected]

Enumerator:
IS_INIT  Initialized.
IS_UNTRIGGERED  Trigger yould not be done.
IS_TRIGGERED  Triggered, waiting to be get to inspect.
IS_INSPECTION  During inspection.
IS_RESULT  Inspection is done and result is set.

Definition at line 76 of file CTracerDriverBase.h.

enum ilolv::CTracerDriverBase::ObjectState [protected]

Describe state of traced object during processing in objects queue.

Enumerator:
OS_INIT  Object initialized (the state after adding to queue).
OS_EJECTION_DECIDED  Ejection decision was made.

The value of ejectorIndex was calculated and it is valid.

OS_CONTROLLED  Controlling of ejection is made.

int  commandBufferSize,
void *  responseBuffer,
int  responseBufferSize,
int &  responseSize 
) [virtual]

Called if user command should be executed.

Parameters:
commandCode code of command.
commandBuffer pointer to command buffer.
commandBufferSize size of command buffer in bytes.
responseBuffer pointer to response buffer.
responseSize size of response buffer in bytes. It is in/out value, should be set to real size of response.
Returns:
true if this command was consumed.

Implements ilolv::IDriver.

virtual bool ilolv::CTracerDriverBase::SetCounterQueuesCount ( int  count  )  [protected, pure virtual]

Set number of needed counter queues.

Single queue generate interrupt if first in queue counter value is reached. After this first element will be removed from queue.

Implemented in ilolv::CSingleCountTracerDriverBase.
